channel.title: Server not online
channel.description: I portforwarded through my server I know I Did cause I turned on my source and i logged in with the client Now the problem is getting the server on moparscape everytime i try to register it on moparscape it says the server is offline.But i noticed something when i logged in on the run-server thing it says connected on something like 127.0.0. how do i change that cause i think thats somewhat the problem thats going on

item.title: Server not online
item.dc:creator: @strd3stroyer strd3stroyer
item.description:
@strd3stroyer wrote:

Ok, You need to change your ip from a local host (127.0.0.1) this is often referred to as home.
You need to change it in Gui.java (if not then client.java)
Search for 127.0.0.1, Change that to you no-ip (If you donâ€™t have one then get one)
Compile and it should work,
Enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: Server not online
item.dc:creator: @flashrobin290 flashrobin290
item.description:
@flashrobin290 wrote:

I portforwarded through my server I know I Did cause
I turned on my source and i logged in with the client
Now the problem is getting the server on moparscape everytime i try to register it on moparscape it says the server is offline.But i noticed something when i logged in on the run-server thing it says connected on something like 127.0.0. how do i change that cause i think thats somewhat the problem thats going on
